issue.title: [CF 336] FROZEN debuff group
issue.body:
Please add a debuff group, which cosists of debuffs when the target is FROZEN (freeze effect) and thus can be shattered by a frost mage.

Description from a frost mage: As long as those effects last, aren't broken, dispelled, etc, your spells will benefit from Shatter and later, from your Mastery at level 80, Frostburn.

SPELL DEBUFS LIST:
Frost Nova (Baseline) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=122
Water Elemental: Freeze (Specialization Ability, Frost only) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=33395
Improved Cone of Cold (Talent, tier 2, accessible for other trees) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=12489
Deep Freeze (Talent, Tier 7(last), Frost only) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=44572
Shattered Barrier (Talent, Tier 5, Frost Only) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=54787
Ring of Frost (Baseline, level 83) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=82676
Fingers of Frost (Talent, Tier 4, Frost only, only for a few spells) http://www.wowhead.com/spell=83074

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user algus2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #336 | Raw

comments.body:
Ohhhh, shiny! I like it!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fingers of frost is an interesting beast, though, because it is the only one there that is not a debuff. I think I will exclude it, because it is just so different from the rest of them (buff on the player vs debuffs on target). I think this is one place where a meta icon would really shine.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ok, added it in. Named it "Shatterable" to prevent conflict with existing debuffs named "Frozen"


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
